HTML and CSS.description: Proficient in HTML syntax, elements, and structure , Familiarity with CSS syntax, basic styling, and layout techniques

JavaScript.description: Proficient in JavaScript syntax, variables, data types, and DOM manipulation.

PHP.description: Basic understanding of PHP syntax, server-side scripting, and working with databases.

Express.js.description: Proficient in Express.js framework for building web applications in Node.js.

Node.js.description: Proficient in Node.js runtime environment for executing JavaScript code server-side.

React.description: Proficient in React library for building user interfaces in JavaScript.

Git.description: Basic understanding of version control concepts and ability to perform basic Git operations like committing changes and pushing to remote repositories.

Web Development Tools.description: Familiarity with basic web development tools like text editors, browsers, and developer tools.
